original_text: He asked this only to test him, for he already had in mind what he was going to do.
korean_text: 이렇게 말씀하심은 친히 어떻게 하실지를 아시고 빌립을 시험하고자 하심이라

sentences.original_text: He asked this only to test him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 시험하기 위해 이것을 물었습니다

sentences.original_text: for he already had in mind
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 이미 마음속에 알고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: what he was going to do
